creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
description: towel scarf, loosely woven linen embroidered at both ends in a geometric design composed of two bands of squares, and highly stylized floral and tree motives, surmounted by three triangle shapes each containing a distinct geometric motif, the whole outlined and seperated by green thread; red, blue, green, yellow and tinsel threads; silk and tinsel on cotton
title: Towel scarf
